page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LOUISE.
page.content: I wake up at about{7.30am.}I have a wash and get dressed and go down stairs for my breakfast.I usually have sugar puffs for my breakfast.I have a lift with my next door neighbour and get to school about{8.40am.}When I get to school my friends and I play tip around the shed till{9.00am,}then school has lessons till{10.45am}then we have playtime.We usually play"Danny 123".Most children bring crisps but can also buy them in school.The playtime ends at{11.00am.}We have lessons till{12.15pm,}then we go for dinner.For dinner we have a caferteria and we choose what we want. The dinner playtime ends at{1.15pm.}We have lessons again till {3.15pm.}I walk home with{Nicola}and{Bethan.}I go to bed about{8.30pm.}I usually read till {9.00pm.}My favourite books are{ {Nancy Drew.}This is a day in my life.
